QAData.question: Who won between Brighton & Hove Albion and Everton on Sat, 28 Aug 2021 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Everton won 2–0 over Brighton & Hove Albion on Sat, 28 Aug 2021 14:00:00 GMT.
